name: Apple Smiles
author: Momi
summary: A goofy snack for you or your little ones. These apples look like wax teeth! Many of the ingredients can be substituted for allergies or preference. Great snack for Halloween or April Fool's Day!
ingredients: 15  mini marshmallows, or more as needed
directions: Slice apple into 4 sections and cut away stem and seeds
Etch the skin of each section with a paring knife to form "lips
" Carve out some of the skin to form a "mouth" between the "lips
" Arrange the mini marshmallows on top of the peanut butter to form the "teeth
" Bite into the fleshly part of the apple so the "teeth" are facing outward
